meanings.definition: The quality or state of being felicitous.
meanings.sent1: Her speech was filled with felicitousnesses, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The felicitousnesses of his words brought joy to all who listened.
meanings.sent3: The party was a sea of felicitousnesses, with laughter and happiness all around.
meanings.sent4: His felicitousnesses in choosing the perfect gift always amazed his friends.
meanings.sent5: The felicitousnesses of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues.

meanings.definition: The ability to express oneself in a pleasing or appropriate manner.
meanings.sent1: She possessed a natural felicitousnesses in her writing, captivating readers effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: His felicitousnesses in public speaking made him a favorite among the audience.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's felicitousnesses in timing his jokes always left the crowd in stitches.
meanings.sent4: Her felicitousnesses in choosing the right words made her a skilled communicator.
meanings.sent5: The actor's felicitousnesses on stage mesmerized the entire audience.

meanings.definition: The state of being well-suited or well-chosen.
meanings.sent1: The felicitousnesses of the color scheme made the room feel warm and inviting.
meanings.sent2: His felicitousnesses in selecting the perfect outfit for the occasion never failed.
meanings.sent3: The chef's felicitousnesses in pairing flavors created a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The artist's felicitousnesses in blending colors resulted in a breathtaking painting.
meanings.sent5: The architect's felicitousnesses in designing the building impressed all who saw it.
